63.name: Shield Master
63.description: You know how to turn defense into offense.
63.requirement: Deliver  killing blows with a shield.

66.name: Rising to the Challenge
66.description: Today, you proved your strength by stopping a threat to the lodge.
66.requirement: Complete the norn personal story step "Minotaur Rampant," "The Last of the Giant-Kings," or "The Wolf Havroun."

70.name: Legacy Code
70.description: Your quick thinking and actions stopped an error in your past from causing disaster in the present.
70.requirement: Complete the asura personal story step "Flash Flood," "Magnum Opus," or "Split Second."

106.name: Speargun Master
106.description: A mighty hunter cuts through the water.
106.requirement: Deliver  killing blows with a speargun.

117.name: Ghostly Hero
117.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
117.requirement: Earn  points in the Hall of Monuments.

120.name: Champion of the Gods
120.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
120.requirement: Earn  points in the Hall of Monuments.

123.name: Hobby Dungeon Explorer
123.description: You return to the depths for adventure's sake.

162.name: Twisted Coil
162.description: Survive the depths of the Twisted Coil.

218.name: Urmaug's Secret
218.description: Find the way up to the ogre's secret stash.

371.name: Jackaloping Along
371.description: Hop a mile in a jackalope's horns.
371.requirement: Get transformed into a jackalope by the Skritt Burglar.

436.name: Daily WvW Caravan Disruptor
436.description: Cut off the enemy supply chain in the Mists.
436.requirement: Destroy  enemy supply caravan in World versus World.

450.name: Daily Champion Slayer
450.requirement: Kill champion foes where you find them.

463.name: Ambient Killer
463.description: Senselessly slaughter helpless ambient Tyrian creatures.

550.name: Minor in Fortitude
550.description: No time to take damage, a super adventure awaits!
550.requirement: Complete any zone without using a health potion or dying.

554.name: Master of Secrets, World 1
554.requirement: Find all of the hidden rooms (excluding furniture shops) in World 1, Zone 3.

590.name: Southsun Cave Sample Collection
590.description: Collect a sample from the tidal caves north of Sawtooth Bay.

656.name: Winner's Circle
656.requirement: You've picked the winner in a number of moa races.

709.name: Parachute Pilferer
709.requirement: Find fallen kite baskets throughout Tyria, and loot their contents.

864.name: Major in Achievement
864.description: Your super adventure genius is unrivaled.

984.name: Sapphire Leaper in the Mists
984.requirement: Complete the jumping puzzle in Sapphire Sanctum.

1059.name: Jumping Mad V
1059.requirement: Complete the Mad King's Clock Tower or Stopped Clock Tower jumping puzzles.

1076.name: Toxic Alliance Slayer
1076.requirement: Kill  members of the Toxic Alliance.

1081.name: Toxic Pollen Survival
1081.requirement: Survive in toxic pollen for  pulses.

1082.name: Toxic Alliance Slayer
1082.requirement: Kill  members of the Toxic Alliance.

1105.name: Tower Toxic Alliance Slayer
1105.requirement: Kill  members of the Toxic Alliance.

1220.name: Aftermath Toxic Field Researcher II
1220.requirement: Collect  toxic spore samples by destroying toxic offshoots.

1267.name: That Wintersday Ring II
1267.requirement: Take part in the Wintersday Bell Choir.

1312.name: Marionette Short-Circuiter
1312.requirement: Triumph in the third assault on the Twisted Marionette's power regulators without being downed or hit by its lightning attack.

1512.name: Light Show
1512.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1512.requirement: Defeat the Aether Cannoneer without being hit by the Aetherblade Megalaser.

1520.name: Bigger, But Not Faster
1520.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1520.requirement: Successfully dodge every assault knight's Extraction attack.

1649.name: A Shocking Development
1649.description: Story Instance: Disturbance in Brisban Wildlands
1649.requirement: Use the Golemites against their master.

1673.name: Crate Scrapper
1673.requirement: Find the hidden Inquest crate and defeat the chromatic creature within it.

1694.name: Coin Collector: Challenger Cliffs
1694.requirement: Find all of the lost coins hidden around Challenger Cliffs.

1695.name: Sand Shield
1695.requirement: Prevent Researcher Eway from falling below 25% health during a Challenger Cliffs sandstorm.

1729.name: Utility Utilizer
1729.requirement: Use one of each of these  utility boost items.

1738.name: Dragon's Jade Weapon Collection
1738.description: <c=@flavor>Who knew bashing dragons could be so fun?</c>
1738.requirement: Unlock all  Dragon's Jade weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1891.name: Daily Behem Gauntlet Jumping Puzzle
1891.requirement: Complete the Behem Gauntlet jumping puzzle in Blazeridge Steppes.

2073.name: Dark Wing Defoliator
2073.requirement: Defeat the Mordrem Vinewrath's champion, the Mordrem Dark Wing.

2076.name: Dragon's Gaze
2076.requirement: Interrupt  skill in the Dragon Ball arena.

2089.name: Balthazar's Weapon Collection
2089.requirement: Unlock all  Balthazar's weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2167.name: New Afterlife for Quaggan
2167.requirement: Donate enough pieces of candy corn to give Drooburt a new start.

2217.name: Fractal Expert
2217.requirement: Complete each fractal scale from 51 to 75.

2235.name: Machined Torch
2235.requirement: Collect all  items to forge your Machined Torch.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Charge an oiled weapon component at a place of power in the Heart of Maguuma.
Found in Noxious Pods in Dragon's Stand.

2259.name: Axemaster Hareth Slayer
2259.description: Another Mordrem commander cut down in his prime.
2259.requirement: Kill Axemaster Hareth during the fight against the Mouth of Mordremoth.

2317.name: Daily Revenant or Elementalist Winner
2317.requirement: Win  PvP match as a revenant or elementalist.

2609.name: Machined Sword
2609.requirement: Collect all  items to forge your Machined Sword.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Charge an oiled weapon component at a place of power in the Heart of Maguuma.
Found in Noxious Pods in Dragon's Stand.

2722.name: League Guardian—Champion
2722.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Champion achievement.
2722.requirement: Win 7 ranked matches as a guardian.

2846.name: Master of Decor, World 2
2846.description: Only the finest from the finest.
2846.requirement: Find all the furniture shops in World 2. Completing this achievement along with the one for World 1 will unlock a vendor tab on Moto's assistants.

2924.name: Daily Dragon's Stand Event Completer
2924.requirement: Complete events in Dragon's Stand in the Heart of Maguuma.

2962.name: Daily Tier 3 Captain Mai Trin Boss
2962.requirement: Complete Captain Mai Trin Boss at fractal scale 51 or higher.

3007.name: Ley-Line "Research"
3007.requirement: Assist the Consortium in collecting accumulated ley energy.

3016.name: Scourge of the White Mantle
3016.description: Way to stick it to the White Mantle.

3034.name: Loonaloo's Paycheck
3034.description:
<c=@flavor>"Quaggan do work, quaggan get paid. Quaggan is told this is how the world works."
—Loonaloo</c>
3034.requirement: In Mount Maelstrom, successfully stop the Inquest from capturing  ley-line coalescences after contributing ley energy to the Consortium.

3060.name: Grand Savant Valis the Learned's Research Journal
3060.requirement: Find the scattered journal entries in Bloodstone Fen.

3099.name: Transfer Chaser
3099.requirement: Complete each task to track a disturbance in magic's flow.

bits.text: Find the sensors in the first location.
Find the sensors in the second location.
Find the sensors in the third location.
Find the sensors in the fourth location.
Find the sensors in the fifth location.

3109.name: Simulation Top Ten
3109.requirement: Complete the Taimi's Game story instance without being defeated.

3203.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 70
3203.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

3211.name: 30-Second Seizure
3211.requirement: Capture all 5 points during the Ensolyss fight within 30 seconds.

3236.name: Shark Tank
3236.requirement: Find and kill Fleshgorge the Shark in the Nightmare lake.

3269.name: Winter Wonderland Mastery
3269.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle  time.

3274.name: Dragon's Breath
3274.requirement: Gain  Dragon Damage power-up in the Dragon Ball arena.

3288.name: It's a Trap
3288.description: Your feet can't repel spikes of that magnitude!
3288.requirement: Navigate Noran's secret trap maze and reach the treasure room.

3290.name: Legacy of Victory
3290.description: "Retreat?" the Sorcerer-King shouted. "Retreat is not an option!"
3290.requirement: Win  rated match in the Legacy of the Foefire.

3349.name: Breaking In
3349.description: "No one enters or leaves without their permission."

3356.name: Temple Slayer
3356.requirement: Defeat  player during Temple of the Silent Storm rated matches.

3379.name: It's a Sabotage
3379.description: Then you're out and you're gone.
3379.requirement: Sabotage the White Mantle stationed inside Fort Evennia.

3457.name: Extracurricular Studies of the Astral Kind

3560.name: Raise the Banners: Salute to Palawa Joko
3560.description: You advised Amnoon's council to accept King Joko's offer of military aid.
3560.requirement: Collect all  items to unlock this piece of equipment.

bits.text: Suggest that Amnoon pay tribute to King Palawa Joko in the story step "Blazing a Trail."
Search for this in a chest lost to the Brand in the Dzasha Uplands of the Domain of Vabbi.
Purchase from Prince Bakkal at the Vehjin Palace in the Domain of Vabbi.
Purchase from Director Abioye Bayu at the Lyssan Fools Theater in the Domain of Vabbi.
Drops from the Snap Spinecrack bounty target in the Domain of Vabbi.
Drops from the Lord Hanif bounty target in the Domain of Vabbi.
Search for this in a chest above the Glowering Overlook in the Domain of Vabbi.
Awarded for completing the story step "The Sacrifice."
Awarded for completing the story step "Crystalline Memories."
Awarded for completing the story step "Facing the Truth."
Awarded for completing the story step "The Way Forward."
Awarded for completing the story step "Bringing Out the Archon."
Awarded for completing the story step "Enemy of My Enemy."
Earn by speaking to Wurmmarshal Osa Ekolo in the story step "Small Victory."

3562.name: Daily Vabbian Bounty Hunter
3562.requirement: Complete a bounty in the Domain of Vabbi.

3582.name: Master Mirage
3582.requirement: Completely train the mesmer's mirage elite specialization.

3677.name: Shadow Patroller
3677.description: Redeemer Kossan—a descendant of Sunspears Koss and Melonni—launches patrols from Torment's Watch, the Order of Shadows camp.
3677.requirement: Help Redeemer Kossan search for Forged activity by successfully patrolling the Ruination.

3683.name: Cleansing Tormented Remnants
3683.description: Generations have passed since Abaddon was defeated, but his tormented energies remain.
3683.requirement: Use your jackal to clear tormented remnants from the Poisoned Outcrops and Helcoid Seeps.

3831.name: Speak in Riddles
3831.requirement: Fight djinn to earn a chance at solving a daily riddle.

bits.text: Solve Jubua the Wildfire's first riddle.
Solve Jubua the Wildfire's second riddle.
Solve Jubua the Wildfire's third riddle.
Solve Jubua the Wildfire's fourth riddle.
Solve Jubua the Wildfire's fifth riddle.

3847.name: Desert Highlands Griffon Master: Gold
3847.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

3849.name: Equipment Tracker
3849.requirement: Find and return Master Sergeant Shadi's lost equipment.

3869.name: Walk a Fine Line
3869.requirement: Reach the very top of the central chamber.

3937.name: Routing the Rebel Rabble
3937.description: Or the non-rebels. Just get in there and we'll sort out the teams later.
3937.requirement: Kill  of the Lunatic Court rebels.

4023.name: Mehdi's Grog
4023.description: Somehow Mehdi turns these into a strong ale.

4070.name: Celestial Messenger
4070.requirement: Complete the race event or time trial adventure in Divinity's Reach during Lunar New Year.

4115.name: The Test Subject
4115.requirement: Scour the lab for clues and make your escape.

4120.name: X-T3R-M1N-8
4120.requirement: Defeat the Mark II Beta Exterminator Golem in under three minutes.

4140.name: Cabbage Shredder
4140.requirement: Arbitrarily ruin a perfectly good vegetable crop.

4214.name: Forearmed Is Forewarned
4214.requirement: Use Blish's stealth tech to secure the receiving portal site and prepare the battlefield.

4224.name: Daily Tier 4 Deepstone
4224.requirement: Complete Deepstone at fractal scale 76 or higher.

4272.name: Domain of Kourna Griffon Expert: Gold
4272.requirement: Earn this achievement by opening the gold chest.

4337.name: Healing Heir
4337.description: Combine 2 Lesser Vision Crystals with 3 Vials of Blood, 6 Sapphire Orbs, and 15 Globs of Ectoplasm in the Mystic Forge to create an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal.
4337.locked_text: Create and consume an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal to begin this journey.

bits.text: This vision crystal is imbued with ectoplasm, enabling the user to see deeper through the veil.
First, in Drytop: Look out over a fallen people...
Then, in Drytop: Rendezvous with a rabble-rousing rock.
Then, in Drytop: Deep underground, a light shines bright as the sun.
Then, in Drytop: Look where waters mend, high above the oasis.
Then, in Drytop: Far to the southwest, high in the sky, there is a place to see both Zephyrite past and future.
Finally, in Drytop: The ghost returns to the crash site, ready to imbue the power of her people into an Oiled Orichalcum Sword Blade...

4354.name: Requiem: Experiment 4
4354.requirement: Untangle this item from the Mists.

4391.name: Daily Jahai Bluffs Inner Keep Completer
4391.requirement: Complete the Inner Keep run in Jahai Fortress.

4448.name: (Annual) Masters of the Labyrinth
4448.requirement: Defeat all 5 champions in the Mad King's Labyrinth. Achievement can be completed once every year.

bits.text: Grand High Viscount of Candy Corn

4474.name: Daily Racer: Lakeside Loop
4474.requirement: Complete laps of the roller beetle race in Gendarran Fields. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4500.name: Chasing Tales: Death by a Thousand Cuts
4500.description: Every strike is a work of art.
4500.requirement: Inflict bleeding 30 times with a short bow in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Inflicted bleeding 30 with a short bow in Thunderhead Peaks.

4504.name: Chasing Tales: Purging Flame
4504.requirement: Defeat 60 Branded enemies while wielding a torch in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Defeated 60 Branded enemies with a torch in Thunderhead Peaks.

4552.name: Daily Thunderhead Peaks Hidden Dwarven-Treasure Hunter
4552.requirement: Open 5 hidden Deldrimor chests within the dwarven ruins of Thunderhead Peaks.

4574.name: Chasing Tales: Fracture
4574.requirement: Defeat 60 Branded enemies while wielding a hammer in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Defeated 60 Branded enemies while wielding a hammer in Thunderhead Peaks.

4696.name: Daily Dragonfall Cocoon Crystallizer
4696.requirement: Join in the final battle of the Dragonfall advance, taking the fight to Kralkatorrik himself.

4814.name: Masters of the Arena
4814.requirement: Defeat the first 5 holographic champions in the Dragon Arena.

4818.name: Stampede Survivor
4818.requirement: Complete Round 3 of the Hologram Stampede event.

5002.name: Demon of a Drifter
5002.requirement: Complete a lap of the Roll into Madness race event or time trial in Mad King's Raceway within the extreme challenge time.

5006.name: (Annual) Raceway Regular
5006.requirement: Complete laps of any race event or time trial in Mad King's Raceway. Gold medal times award additional progress. Achievement can be completed once every year.

5012.name: Whisper in the Dark Mastery
5012.requirement: Complete all  Whisper in the Dark achievements.

bits.text: Finish the story chapter Silence in the "Whisper in the Dark" episode of the Icebrood Saga.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Axe Skin to purchase.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Dagger Skin to purchase.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Focus Skin to purchase.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Greatsword skin to purchase.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Hammer Skin to purchase.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Longbow Skin to purchase.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Mace Skin to purchase.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Pistol Skin to purchase.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Rifle Skin to purchase.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Scepter Skin to purchase.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Shield Skin to purchase.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Short Bow Skin to purchase.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Staff Skin to purchase.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Sword Skin to purchase.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Torch Skin to purchase.
Unlock the Ancient Boreal Warhorn Skin to purchase.

5079.name: Best Wishes for the New Year
5079.requirement: Complete the New Year's Fortune achievement five times over the course of the Lunar New Year festival. The New Year's Fortune achievement is located in the Daily tab.

5115.name: Anvil Drop
5115.requirement: Get crushed by a falling Claw of Jormag bombardment in Bjora Marches or Drizzlewood Coast.

5125.name: Fraenir Frolic
5125.requirement: Defeat the Fraenir of Jormag without being hit by any shock waves.

5151.name: Plains of Ashford Novice Explorer
5151.requirement: Complete renown hearts, unlock points of interest and waypoints, and view vistas in the beginning area of Plains of Ashford.

bits.text: Help Tolona Ironrustler with her farm.
Help Crucibis Forgeweld run the armory.
Help Scar Stripeclaw organize the wrecking yard.
Rid the training area of pests.
Help Strum Bassclash secure Lake Feritas.
Help Latera Painstorm fight the Flame Legion.
Help Bryllana Deepmind thin out ghosts.
Help Kyra Sharptracker thin out ghosts.
Point of Interest: Three Legions Court
Point of Interest: The Wrecking Yard

5155.name: Metrica Province Novice Explorer
5155.requirement: Complete renown hearts, unlock points of interest and waypoints, and view vistas in the beginning area of Metrica Province.

bits.text: Assist Professor Gahf in teaching his young progeny.
Assist the Opticalium with lightning research.
Assist Researcher Kaii with Incomp's scrap heap.
Assist PR&T Esoterics with ooze research.
Help Blopp stop the Inquest from using hylek poison to drive lake creatures crazy.
Help Shoon's salvage krewe deal with Inquest interference.
Point of Interest: Splorg Metamystics Lab
Point of Interest: Aquannian Research Group

5174.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Twenty-One
5174.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-One.

5186.name: Visions of the Past: The Nightmare Incarnate
5186.description: Unlock a key moment from Living World Season 1: Episode 14, "The Nightmares Within," which is then accessed from the Scrying Pool in Eye of the North.
5186.requirement: Find a memento of a past battle in the ruins of the Nightmare Tower in Kessex Hills.

5307.name: Special Mission: Percussive Maintenance
5307.requirement: Destroy  turrets near Lighthouse Point, Vloxen Mine, Petraj Overlook, or Leadfoot Village in the Drizzlewood Coast.
5307.locked_text: Unlock by using Iron Legion Special Mission Documents.

5309.name: Special Mission: Cull the Herd
5309.requirement: Kill  hostile animals in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5370.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast: The Ox's Yoke
5370.requirement: Complete the Ox's Yoke adventure in Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

5390.name: Special Mission: Shut the Doors
5390.description: <c=@flavor>"Were you raised in an interdimensional barn? Close the portals!"</c>
5390.requirement: Destroy  Aberrant, Fallen, or Svanir portals in the Northern Drizzlewood Coast.
5390.locked_text: Unlock by using Corrupted Intel Documents.

5500.name: Once More...
5500.description: Wash your hands. Don't touch your face.
5500.requirement: Play through every chapter of No Quarter with voiceover added.

bits.text: Emergency Dragon Responder: Fields of Ruin
Top Dragon Responder: Fields of Ruin

5609.name: League Conqueror—3v3 Season Three
5609.requirement: Win  ranked matches during 3v3 Season Three.

5702.name: Put Them on Ice
5702.requirement: During the Dragonstorm encounter, attack Jormag  time while they are exposed.

5742.name: Return to Bloodstone Fen
5742.requirement: Complete  Return to Out of the Shadows achievements.

5825.name: Return to Confessor's End
5825.requirement: Complete the mission Confessor's End in Living World Season 3 Episode 4.

5837.name: Community Drift Master
5837.requirement: Win a roller beetle community tournament run by an ArenaNet Partner.

5873.name: Revenge of Sulypix
5873.requirement: Slay Sulypix during the Oil Floes meta-event.

5926.name: Return to Drizzlewood Coast 2
5926.requirement: Complete  Return to Jormag Rising achievements.

5957.name: (Bonus) Strike Back: Rally at the Eye
5957.requirement: Complete any Icebrood Saga Strike Mission.

6028.name: Mini Shiba Pup Collection
6028.requirement: Unlock all shiba pup minis in your wardrobe.

6060.name: White Tiger Weapon Collection
6060.requirement: Unlock all  White Tiger weapon skins in your wardrobe.

6096.name: Daily Echovald Wilds Taskmaster
6096.description: Always happy to lend a hand.
6096.requirement: Complete a renown heart in the Echovald Wilds.

6187.name: Renowned Adventurer: Echovald Wilds
6187.requirement: Complete all the renown hearts in the Echovald Wilds.

6250.name: Avid Desert Isles Fisher
6250.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6250.requirement: Collect  different fish from the isles off the coast of Elona.

6265.name: Eternal Seitung Harbor Shenanigans
6265.requirement: Successfully complete events around Seitung Harbor in Seitung Province.

bits.text: Help Hei-Ryung deliver her goods to the correct recipient.
Help Ji-Cheol deliver his goods to the correct recipient.
Find the toys stolen by the mischievous spirits.
Subdue Tae-Sung to protect the spirits of Zen Daijun.
Stop the extremist Speakers from binding the spirits.
Escort the ritualist to the main temple in Zen Daijun.

6276.name: Mantis Pose
6276.requirement: Check in on a training friend.

6292.name: Mysteries Deep Within
6292.requirement: Defeat the creature at the end of the Trial of the Elders.

6311.name: Adept Harbinger
6311.requirement: Begin training the necromancer's harbinger elite specialization.

6336.name: Seitung Province Fisher
6336.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6336.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways around Seitung Province.

Found in the waters of Seitung Province.
Fishing Hole: Offshore Fish
Favored Bait: Any
Time of Day: Any

Found in the waters of Seitung Province.
Fishing Hole: Offshore Fish
Favored Bait: Sardines
Time of Day: Nighttime

Found in the waters of Seitung Province.
Fishing Hole: Offshore Fish
Favored Bait: Shrimplings
Time of Day: Daytime

6347.name: The Old City of Decay
6347.requirement: Kill  Unchained Risen in New Kaineng City.

6412.name: Delivery Service Champion
6412.requirement: Help Sakda and Miju complete their deliveries in New Kaineng.

6425.name: Industrial Espionage
6425.description: Thought is merciless to privilege, established institutions, and comfortable habit.
6425.requirement: Find all of the subversive memos and notes at the Xunlai Jade power plant.

6431.name: Legendary Kaineng Overlook
6431.requirement: Complete the Kaineng Overlook Strike Mission with challenge mode active.

6444.name: Boarding Party
6444.requirement: Attempted to Board an Aetherblade Ship

6487.name: Soapbox Preacher
6487.requirement: Kill  Purists in New Kaineng City.

6512.name: Honorary Citizen of New Kaineng
6512.requirement: Complete all of the renown hearts in New Kaineng City.

bits.text: Help the tengu of Cobble Ward restore their district.
Help the East Precinct protect Grub Lane.
Help Xunlai Jade test and promote jade tech.

6541.name: Lion's Memory
6541.requirement: Gather mementos from each episode of Living Story Season 1 by completing their respective meta-achievements.

6577.name: Aether Investigation
6577.requirement: Complete the story chapter Aether Investigation.

6608.name: Earning Crafting Levels II
6608.requirement:
Earn 30 crafting levels.

<c=@reminder>Craft items to earn crafting experience for that crafting discipline, allowing you to create more powerful items.</c>

6661.name: Defeating World Bosses III
6661.requirement:
Defeat  of the world bosses in Frostgorge Sound or Mount Maelstrom.

<c=@reminder>World bosses are challenging events that appear at specific times of day across Tyria. Defeat them to receive chests containing rare equipment and crafting materials. </c>

6675.name: Completing Renown Hearts III
6675.requirement:
Complete  renown heart in the Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, or the Harathi Hinterlands.

<c=@reminder>Renown hearts are marked with a golden heart icon on the map. Every renown heart is different, so check your HUD when nearby to find out how you can assist.</c>

6729.name: Decade of Adventure: Orr
6729.requirement: Complete  events in the Orr region.

6745.name: Decade of Adventure: Cantha
6745.requirement: Complete  events in the Cantha region.

6751.name: Making the Antitoxin
6751.requirement: Complete the story chapter Making the Antitoxin.

6796.name: Seeking Scarlet: Old Lion's Court
6796.requirement: Complete the Old Lion's Court Strike Mission, which can be accessed from Lion's Arch after completing the episode "The Battle for Lion's Arch."

6802.name: Raiders of the Lost Parts II
6802.requirement: Find and retrieve Taimi's golem parts from the Edge of the Mists.

6815.name: The Facet of Fire and Destruction
6815.requirement: Unlock all legendary Primordus weapon variants.

6830.name: League Participator—3v3 Season Eight
6830.requirement: Play  ranked matches during 3v3 Season Eight.

6949.name: Forward
6949.requirement: Meet with Aurene at Seitung Harbor.

7100.name: Insect Incinerator
7100.description: Thank goodness Gorrik isn't here to witness this.
7100.requirement:
In Primal Maguuma, help the Ward Technician reduce the insect population using your skyscale.

Using the Fireball Mastery grants more progress.

7115.name: Skywatch Archipelago Insight: The Fractured Tower
7115.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Skywatch Archipelago.

7213.name: Amnytas Insight: Bastion Shallows
7213.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Amnytas.

7239.name: Only the Strong Survive
7239.description: With all this food, you can take to the streets and start your own food cart. You'll be rich!
7239.requirement:
At Wizard's Ascent, correctly prepare 45 ingredients for Alchemist Briella.

If you have the Knowing Is Half the Battle achievement, progress is doubled for successful ingredient preparations.

7350.name: Dungeon Delver: Honor of the Waves
7350.requirement: Complete any path of the Honor of the Waves dungeon.

7570.name: Fractal Rush Veteran
7570.requirement: Complete  different scale 21–50 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

7611.name: Absolute Focus
7611.description: Indoctrination will influence us no more.
7611.requirement: Join the Astral Ward members in a meditation session at the Overmere Meditation Circle.

7774.name: Inner Nayos: Nyedra, Dreamer's Sanctum Savior
7774.description: Helping those that can't help themselves.
7774.requirement: Successfully complete unique events in Nyedra, Dreamer's Sanctum in Inner Nayos.

bits.text: Escort the frightened Kryptis to safety.
Defeat the champion Avatar of Envy.

7830.name: A Record of War
7830.requirement: Complete each of the bastion achievements and learn about the Kryptis and Nayos.

7908.name: Fabled Paragon
7908.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a guardian.

7960.name: Relics—Secrets of the Obscure Set 3
7960.requirement: Collect  relics from Secrets of the Obscure Relics Set 3.

bits.text: Achievement: Event Collection: Spire of Redemption
Achievement: Event Collection: Spire of Creation
Achievement: Secrets of the Obscure: The Midnight King Mastery
Achievement: Event Collection: Citadel of Zakiros

8137.name: Sunken Treasure Week: Gendarran Fields
8137.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
8137.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Gendarran Fields.

8209.name: Ash Legion Diplomacy
8209.requirement: Find Malice's hiding spot in Harvest Den before it's time to meet up with her.

8260.name: Kodan Spear Fighting
8260.description: You've learned the ancient art of wielding a spear in combat on land.
8260.requirement: Complete the Kodan Spear Training mastery of the Kodan Mastery line, or purchase Land Spear Training from a Heroics Notary in WvW.

8283.name: Janthir Syntri Explorer
8283.description: You've explored the storm-ridden island of Janthir Syntri.
8283.requirement: Explore all areas in Janthir Syntri.

8289.name: Janthir Cartographer
8289.description: Learning the ground on which you battle is as important as the battle itself.
8289.requirement: Achieve gold on the River Mapping adventure.

8298.name: Moonlit Reading
8298.requirement: Read all of the literature around Moon Camp.

8315.name: Janthir Syntri Insight: Thunder Bay Overlook
8315.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Janthir Syntri.

8336.name: Build-a-Quaggan: Cubs
8336.requirement: Speak with kodan cubs to learn about popular toys.
8336.locked_text: Locked until you progress the collection.

8347.name: The Falling Star: Seizing the Star
8347.requirement: Complete your quest and draw forth the Falling Star.

8397.name: Foes Reborn: Awakened
8397.requirement: Defeat Awakened enemies in any region.

8473.name: (Repeatable) Mount Balrior: Supplier of Supplies
8473.description: "Stoic Alder, what's a 'tectic thumber' made of?"
8473.requirement: Deliver  supply to thumpers in Mount Balrior Convergences. Supplies used to build a thumper award more progress.

8476.name: Mount Balrior Raid Expert
8476.description: A good wayfinder is a practiced guide, mentor, and friend.
8476.requirement: Complete the three Raid Mentor achievements for each Mount Balrior raid encounter.

8498.name: Infinite Shield Generator
8498.requirement: Complete all tasks to unlock the Infinite Shield Generator.

bits.text: Purchase a shield generator token from the skirmish supervisor.
Purchase a shield generator mechanism from the skirmish supervisor.
Purchase shield generator parts from the old centaur in Eboneigh Territory or Brownmane Camp.
Salvage parts from the broken down shield generator in Osprey's Palace.
Complete the associated siege expertise achievement.

8539.name: Adventurous Spirit: Arena of the Wolverine (Weekly)
8539.requirement: Complete the Arena of the Wolverine adventure in Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

8604.name: Search-and-Rescue Challenge: Bronze
8604.requirement: Earn a bronze medal while finding lost kodan scouts in the Search-and-Rescue challenge.

8694.name: Roller Beetle Racing Participant
8694.requirement: Speak with Sareb in Southsun Cove to learn about the Roller Beetle Racing event.

8703.name: Rolling Competitor: Tropic Valley Raceway (Weekly)
8703.requirement: Complete laps of the roller beetle race in Brisban Wildlands. The final lap of a race event rewards extra progress. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

8759.name: Demons Within
8759.requirement: Eliminate 50 of the shadow creatures in the titan's heart chamber.

8782.name: Best Friends Forever
8782.description: If you've got friends, don't let them leave.
8782.requirement: Witness a skritt reunite with her friend in the Mystic Forge after his memories are restored.
